statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT location, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT email, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, location FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age >= 18 ORDER BY location, full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high'
SELECT profile_id, investment_amount FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY investment_amount
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT profile_id, risk_tolerance FROM investment_preferences WHERE investment_duration < 5
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT user_id, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM user_profiles JOIN investment_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = investment_preferences.profile_id
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY risk_tolerance DESC;
SELECT user_id, investment_type, preferred_sector FROM investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, username, city FROM user_profiles WHERE city = 'New York' OR age < 25;
SELECT user_profiles.username, investment_preferences.risk_tolerance FROM user_profiles JOIN investment_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = investment_preferences.user_id;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE city = 'London');
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, country FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT asset_id, recommendation_id, asset_name FROM recommended_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY email ASC;

SELECT u.full_name, i.risk_tolerance, i.investment_amount, r.recommendation_text FROM user_profiles u JOIN investment_preferences i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE i.investment_amount > 5000;

SELECT r.recommendation_text, a.asset_name, a.asset_type, a.asset_price FROM recommendations r JOIN recommended_assets a ON r.recommendation_id = a.recommendation_id WHERE a.asset_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY a.asset_price DESC;

SELECT u.full_name, i.investment_horizon, r.recommendation_text, a.asset_name FROM user_profiles u JOIN investment_preferences i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN recommended_assets a ON r.recommendation_id = a.recommendation_id WHERE u.country = 'Canada' ORDER BY i.investment_horizon ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, recommended_by FROM stock_recommendations WHERE recommended_rating = 'High';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40;
SELECT user_id, investment_amount, investment_type FROM investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, recommended_rating FROM stock_recommendations WHERE recommended_by = 'Analyst A' AND stock_price < 100;

SELECT u.full_name, i.stock_name, ih.investment_date FROM user_profiles u JOIN investment_history ih ON u.user_id = ih.user_id JOIN stock_recommendations i ON ih.stock_id = i.stock_id WHERE u.age < 50 ORDER BY ih.investment_date DESC;
